mapper.update: MERGE INTO AC_CATEGORY USING DUAL ON (CATE_OID=#{cateOid}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET CATE_NAME = #{cateName} CATE_UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( CATE_OID , CATE_NAME , CATE_TYPE , CATE_UPDATE_DATE, CATE_CREATE_DATE ) VALUES ( AC_CATEGORY_SEQ .NEXTVAL, #{cateOid}, #{cateName}, 'Y', SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
